plot: A male 4400 originally from Rwanda repairs bad chromosomes of unborn. Kyle is utterly despaired as he suddenly remembers what he did during his blackout. Richard attends a co-veteran's funeral. Diana makes a hard family decision.

A returnee who's from Africa discovers he has the ability to help children with deformities. The press does a story on him and when a old woman from the same country sees him, she remembers him as the one who was behind a lot of atrocities. .So there's a request to send him back and Tom supports it while Diana thinks he can help so many. Eventually they learn his ability is also killing him so if he continues to use it, it will kill him and if he doesn't there's no reason to let him stay. Richard has a reunion with the men he served with. While with them they bring up the incident before he vanished and the one who led it is not around so he goes to see him.—rcs0411@yahoo.com
